Since I was born I wanted to do something meaningful,...
...and not waste my time on this planet.
You feel every emotion all in one time.
I think it's the greatest challenge you'll ever face in life.
You try it and then you cannot stop.
The joy that comes from seeing something that you thought about...
...and then now you see it starting to take off.
There is nothing that can parallel this.
It's really almost like a very primal thing.
We've been doing it since the beginning of time.
Entrepreneurs start small and they aim high.
And of course, most of them fail on their way.
But once they achieve the goal, they change the world.
